LanguageData.RT_ZBD86_Vehicle_Blueprint.label: ZBD86
LanguageData.RT_ZBD86_Vehicle_Blueprint.description:
An IFV equipped with a 73mm cannon with auto-loader and 7.62mm machine gun, still cannot guide missiles but have good transportation capacity.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x2，Passenger x8
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel

<color=#b0e0e6>CE Ammo:</color> 
SPG9Rocket（Main Cannon）
7.62x54mmR（Coaxial MG）
